name: 夏花的轨迹——A summer promise to forever
name_original: 夏花的轨迹——A summer promise to forever
description:
Features and Content:
This is an electronic visual novel about Chinese rural subjects. You can learn about some unknown things about the countryside behind the developed China, which are rarely to seen in other visual Novels.You can save the girl who suffered persecution in the feudal countryside by clicking on the mouse.


Story:
Jiajun Lin, a high school student and the hero of this story. He came to a village named Tangxia because of the request from his father, who was the principal of a private school. He met a farm girl who had her own dream and he also met his childhood after a 10-year separation here. As the time goes by, the hero was blended in the village life. However, he realized that some unsightly social abuses were hidden behind the beautiful landscape of this village. The hero, was trying to save these two girls from those abuses...


Character Introduction:
①

Yinlin Chen
Weight: 45kg
Height: 164cm
Blood Type: O
Birthday: July 6th
She was traded to Tangxia village as a child bride at a very young age. Since the people who took her to this village died in an accident, all the villagers believed that she was a jinx. With the help from Yufan Wu, she was able to survived barely in the village. Now she is living alone.

②

Wanxue Wu
Weight: 48kg
Height: 165cm
Blood Type: Ab
Birthday: December 26th
A firm girl who lives in Tnagxia village. She became really eccentric and indifferent after her mother's death. She likes drawing. She loves to draw. However, she has to draw secretly because of the pressure from her family. She believes that one day she could draw the whole world with her hands.

③

Jianchen Chen
Weight:58kg
Height:177cm
Blood Type:a
Birthday:january 5th
The son of the local high school principal. He takes care of all the things for the hero in school. He is very usually careless, causal, and does not like to work hard. However, he is also open-minded. For some reasons, he became the hero's good friend. He is also unsatisfied with the old social abuses in the village.

④

Yufan Wu
Weight:62kg
Height:181cm
Blood Type:ab
Birthday:june 4th
A farmer of Tangxia Village, the father of WanXue Wu. He took care of the hero because of the request from the hero's father. He has very high prestige from the villagers, and everyone calls him Uncle Wu.
